term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - energy yield of luminescence
term.title: energy yield of luminescence

item.text: The ratio of the energy emitted as luminescence to the energy absorbed by a species.

sources.item: PAC, 1984, 56, 231. 'Nomenclature, symbols, units and their usage in spectrochemical analysis-Part VI: molecular luminescence spectroscopy' on page 243 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198456020231)
